description: 2 short blocks from the studio to the train/subway. One express train to Manhattan, Times Square & 15 minutes to JFK airport (cheap Uber/taxi fees!), COMFY bed, private entrance, keys to the apartment. There is a TV in each bedroom with internet TV and Netflix, air conditioner, and heat. Clean space for couples. Free easy parking on the streets! High speed WiFi signal. There are restaurants, and businesses open 24/7 a block away.
name: Lovely studio 2 min walk to train/ subway
review:
Great location, host was very accommodating when I asked to check-in early. Place is very neat, and has great amenities. Perfect size with a lovely tv.
Would definitely recommend.
